name: Resume Screening & Evaluation System with Gemini AI, Google Sheets & Drive for HR

user.name: Tharwat Mohamed
user.bio: I'm a system engineer , who's facinated by ai and automation , I like building systems and agents

description:
üöÄ AI Resume Screener (n8n Workflow Template)

An AI-powered resume screening system that automatically evaluates applicants from a simple web form and gives you clear, job-specific scoring ‚Äî no manual filtering needed.



‚ö° What the workflow does





üìÑ Accepts CV uploads via a web form (PDF)



üß† Extracts key info using AI (education, skills, job history, city, birthdate, phone)



üéØ Dynamically matches the candidate to job role criteria stored in Google Sheets



üìù Generates an HR-style evaluation and a numeric score (1‚Äì10)



üì• Saves the result in a Google Sheet and uploads the original CV to Google Drive



üí° Why you‚Äôll love it

FeatureBenefitAI scoringInstantly ranks candidate fit without reading every CVGoogle Sheet-drivenEasily update job profiles ‚Äî no code changesFast setupConnect your accounts and you're live in ~15 minsScalableWorks for any department, team, or organizationDeveloper-friendlyExtend with Slack alerts, translations, or automations



üß∞ Requirements





üîë OpenAI or Google Gemini API Key



üìÑ Google Sheet with 2 columns: Role, Profile Wanted



‚òÅÔ∏è Google Drive account



üåê n8n account (self-hosted or cloud)



üõ† Setup in 5 Steps





Import the workflow into n8n



Connect Google Sheets, Drive, and OpenAI or Gemini



Add your job roles and descriptions in Google Sheets



Publish the form and test with a sample CV



Watch candidate profiles and scores populate automatically



ü§ù Want help setting it up?

Includes free setup guidance by the creator ‚Äî available by email or WhatsApp after purchase.
I‚Äôm happy to assist you in customizing or deploying this workflow for your team.

üìß Email: tharwat.elsayed2000@gmail.com
üí¨ WhatsApp: +20106 180 3236

parameters.formDescription: Please ,fill the required fields , and we'll get in touch with you soon !

options.systemPromptTemplate:
You are an expert extraction algorithm.
Only extract relevant information from the text.
If you do not know the value of an attribute asked to extract, you may omit the attribute's value.

attributes.name: Educational qualification
attributes.description: Summary of your academic career. Focus on your high school and university studies. Summarize in 100 words maximum and also include your grade if applicable.

attributes.name: Job History
attributes.description: Work history summary. Focus on your most recent work experiences. Summarize in 100 words maximum

attributes.name: Skills
attributes.description: Extract the candidate‚Äôs technical skills. What software and frameworks they are proficient in. Make a bulleted list.

messageValues.message: You are an HR expert and need to assess if the candidate aligns with the profile the company is looking for. You must give a score from 1 to 10, where 1 means the candidate is not at all aligned with the requirements, while 10 means they are the ideal candidate because they perfectly match the desired profile. Additionally, in the "consideration" field, explain why you gave that score

options.systemPromptTemplate:

parameters.content:
üéØ AI Resume Screener ‚Äì Form-Based HR Automation

This workflow automates the entire resume screening process using AI.
It extracts key details from uploaded CVs, compares candidates to job-specific profiles stored in Google Sheets, and logs evaluation scores and summaries for easy HR review.

üõ† Setup Required:

Google Sheets with Role + Profile Wanted columns

Google Drive account (for CV uploads)

OpenAI or Gemini API Key

Activate webhook for the form

‚úÖ What this workflow does:

Accepts CV uploads via form

Extracts candidate qualifications and personal data using AI

Summarizes the candidate‚Äôs background

Looks up the job profile from your Google Sheet

Scores and evaluates the match using AI

Saves results and uploads CV to Drive

ü§ù Need Help Setting This Up?

I‚Äôm happy to assist you in customizing or deploying this workflow for your team.

üìß Email: tharwat.elsayed2000@gmail.com
üí¨ WhatsApp: +20106 180 3236

üß∞ Optional Extensions:

Add email or Slack notifications

Support multiple languages with a translation step

Replace the form trigger with Google Drive or Airtable
The CV is uploaded to Google Drive and converted so that it can be processed
The essential information for evaluating the candidate is collected in two different chains
Summary of relevant information useful for classifying the candidate
Characteristics of the profile sought by the company that intends to hire the candidate
Candidate evaluation with vote and considerations of the HR agent relating the profile sought with the candidate's skills
